title: Wing's Visit to Singapore
description: When Wing visits Singapore, his Uncle Lee takes him fishing on Bedok Jetty. It is Wing's first time fishing and he is not sure he will enjoy himself. As his uncle encourages him to keep trying, Wing learns that fishing can be fun after all. Pictures support the text.
meta: catch, caught, fishing pole, hook, jetty, line, Singapore, threw, worm
Use the reading strategy of retelling to understand and remember story events
